com.percolate.caffeine

Class ViewUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.percolate.caffeine.ViewUtils

  • public class ViewUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    Utility methods that make working with views easier, less error prone, and more concise.

    Common uses:

    TextView textView = ViewUtils.findViewById(this, R.id.my_text_view); //no more casting!
    TextView textView = ViewUtils.findViewById(parentView, R.id.my_text_view); //no more casting!
    String text = ViewUtils.getText(this, R.id.my_text_view);
    ViewUtils.setText(this, R.id.my_text_vew, "new text");
    ViewUtils.setText(textView, "new text");
    ViewUtils.appendText(textView, "appended");
    ViewUtils.hideView(this, R.id.my_text_view);
    ViewUtils.showView(this, R.id.my_text_view);
    Bitmap bitmap = ViewUtils.viewToImage(this, R.id.my_layout);
    ViewUtils.showKeyboard(this, R.id.my_text_view);
    ViewUtils.closeKeyboard(this, R.id.my_text_view);

    • Method Detail

      • findViewById

        public static <T extends android.view.View> T findViewById(android.app.Activity context,
                                           int id)
        Utility method to make getting a View via findViewById() more safe & simple. - Casts view to appropriate type based on expected return value - Handles & logs invalid casts
        Parameters:
        context - The current Context or Activity that this method is called from
        id - R.id value for view
        Returns:
        View object, cast to appropriate type based on expected return value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if cast to the expected type breaks.

      • findViewById

        public static <T extends android.view.View> T findViewById(android.view.View parentView,
                                           int id)
        Utility method to make getting a View via findViewById() more safe & simple. - Casts view to appropriate type based on expected return value - Handles & logs invalid casts
        Parameters:
        parentView - Parent View containing the view we are trying to get
        id - R.id value for view
        Returns:
        View object, cast to appropriate type based on expected return value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if cast to the expected type breaks.

      • getText

        public static java.lang.String getText(android.widget.TextView view)
        Get text as String from EditView. Note: returns "" for null EditText, not a NullPointerException
        Parameters:
        view - EditView to get text from
        Returns:
        the text

      • viewToImage

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap viewToImage(android.content.Context context,
                                  android.webkit.WebView viewToBeConverted)
        Convert view to an image. Can be used to make animations smoother.
        Parameters:
        context - The current Context or Activity that this method is called from
        viewToBeConverted - View to convert to a Bitmap
        Returns:
        Bitmap object that can be put in an ImageView. Will look like the converted viewToBeConverted.
